title: Market share of UK gambling industry sectors from year 2009 to 2014
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 6 lines denoting Betting, Casino, Remote, Bingo, Arcades, and Lottery. The y axis indicates the Market Share and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Remote is gradually increasing, Betting, and Arcades are gradually decreasing, Casino, Bingo, and Lottery are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Betting mostly maintained the highest Market Share when compared to others with a mean value of 49.6, and it peaked at 2009, and 2010.
Followed by Casino which ranks as the second topmost line , with an average of 15.2 Market Share,reaching its highest point  at 2013 with a value of 16.0.
Lottery mostly had the least Market Share with a mean value of 4.0, which peaked at 2011, and 2013 with a value of 5.0.
